Sentencas: This paper presents a multi-loop control strategy for a SOFC/GT hybrid system.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: A detailed dynamic model of the system is presented and its part-load performance is studied.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The control objectives are discussed, with the main issue being a fairly constant fuel cell temperature under all conditions.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Based on the system configuration and part-load performance, input and output variables of the control system are detected.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Control cycles are introduced and their design is discussed.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The responses of the resulting system on load changes, external disturbances as well as malfunction and degradation incidents are investigated.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The system is stable under all incidents.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: An error in fuel flow measurement or assumed fuel quality provokes a steady-state fuel cell temperature offset.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: For a degraded system, it may be advisable to readjust the control system to the new characteristics.
Titulo: Control strategy for a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid system
